scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/ethereum-mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:sepolia: mustache config/ethereum-sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/matic-mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:amoy: mustache config/matic-amoy.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/blocks-ethereum-mainnet
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npm run prepare:sepolia && npx graph deploy --studio blocks-ethereum-sepolia
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run prepare:matic && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ decentraland/blocks-matic-mainnet
scripts.deploy:amoy: npm run prepare:amoy && npx graph deploy --studio decentraland/blocks-matic-amoy
